ComicInfo.Summary: Rendered psychotic by the leech-like creature on the back of his neck, the Dragon goes on a downtown rampage. He combats She-Dragon, Star, and several of the homeless "freaks" such as Beast Boy, and finally, Mace. Meanwhile, Frank Darling is almost killed by Skullface.

ComicInfo.Title: The Leech and the Dragon
